name: flow-tracker
title: Flow Tracker
description: A minimalist extension designed to effortlessly assist you in tracking and logging your focus time. Whether you are studying, working, or immersing yourself in a deep flow state, Flow Tracker ensures you remain cognizant of your productivity. Additionally, it provides a Stats and Achievements page for comprehensive analysis and recognition of your accomplishments.
author: leandro.maia

commands.name: track-flow
commands.title: Menu Bar Flow Tracker
commands.subtitle: Flow Tracker
commands.description: Track your focus time and stay in the zone

commands.name: stats
commands.title: Flow Tracker Stats
commands.subtitle: Flow Tracker
commands.description: View detailed statistics of your flow sessions

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
